message: Let's start with a fair split, and we can adjust in subsequent rounds.
I think I can do better than that. Your turn to negotiate!
That's a big increase for Bob. I'm not willing to give up that much. I'll think of a new offer.
I'm willing to compromise, but I still think I deserve a bit more. Let's meet in the middle?
You're getting closer to my target, but I still think I can get a better deal. Keep trying!
I'm not willing to give up more than I did in the last round. I'll try to come up with a new offer that's even closer to my target.
I'm willing to give you a slight edge, but I'm not willing to give up too much more. This is my final offer.
